class thirdai.bolt.nn.losses.BinaryCrossEntropy

Bases: LossFunction

A loss function for multi-label (multiple class labels per each sample) classification tasks.

class thirdai.bolt.nn.losses.MeanSquaredError

Bases: LossFunction

A loss function that minimizes mean squared error (MSE) for regression tasks. MSE = sum( (actual - prediction)^2 )

__annotations__ = {}
__init__(self: thirdai._thirdai.bolt.nn.losses.MeanSquaredError) → None

Constructs a MeanSquaredError object.

__module__ = 'thirdai._thirdai.bolt.nn.losses'
class thirdai.bolt.nn.losses.WeightedMeanAbsolutePercentageError

Bases: LossFunction

A loss function to minimize weighted mean absolute percentage error (WMAPE) for regression tasks. WMAPE = 100% * sum(|actual - prediction|) / sum(|actual|)

__annotations__ = {}
__init__(self: thirdai._thirdai.bolt.nn.losses.WeightedMeanAbsolutePercentageError) → None

Constructs a WeightedMeanAbsolutePercentageError object.

__module__ = 'thirdai._thirdai.bolt.nn.losses'
